Across IT, healthcare, and software development, leaders are discovering that the next leap in performance doesnâ€™t come from expanding headcountâ€”it comes from augmenting teams with intelligent automation. As we weigh the complex strategic choices in an age of rapid change, AI has become an indispensable co-pilotâ€”delivering more reliable infrastructure, fewer diagnostic errors, and velocity in code releases that even the best-managed teams alone canâ€™t match.Manual review of patient records, server logs, or code changes is no longer just inefficientâ€”itâ€™s a liability. Automated compliance and anomaly detection in IT slashes risks and costs. In healthcare, AI-powered workflow automation is raising care quality while reclaiming hours for clinical focus. In software development, intelligent deployment pipelines cut testing cycles and surface bugs before they reach production.Integrated, AI-accelerated operations now outperform piecemeal automation every time, driving both productivity and strategic insight. If your DevOps, clinical scheduling, or cybersecurity checks are still siloed, youâ€™re competing on yesterdayâ€™s terms. As we weigh the complex strategic choices in an age of rapid change, AI has become an indispensable co-pilotâ€”delivering more reliable infrastructure, fewer diagnostic errors, and velocity in code releases that even the best-managed teams alone canâ€™t match.Manual review of patient records, server logs, or code changes is no longer just inefficientâ€”itâ€™s a liability. In software development, intelligent deployment pipelines cut testing cycles and surface bugs before they reach production.Integrated, AI-accelerated operations now outperform piecemeal automation every time, driving both productivity and strategic insight. As we weigh the complex strategic choices in an age of rapid change, AI has become an indispensable co-pilotâ€”delivering more reliable infrastructure, fewer diagnostic errors, and velocity in code releases that even the best-managed teams alone canâ€™t match.Manual review of patient records, server logs, or code changes is no longer just inefficientâ€”itâ€™s a liability. In software development, intelligent deployment pipelines cut testing cycles and surface bugs before they reach production.Integrated, AI-accelerated operations now outperform piecemeal automation every time, driving both productivity and strategic insight. As we weigh the complex strategic choices in an age of rapid change, AI has become an indispensable co-pilotâ€”delivering more reliable infrastructure, fewer diagnostic errors, and velocity in code releases that even the best-managed teams alone canâ€™t match.Manual review of patient records, server logs, or code changes is no longer just inefficientâ€”itâ€™s a liability. In software development, intelligent deployment pipelines cut testing cycles and surface bugs before they reach production.Integrated, AI-accelerated operations now outperform piecemeal automation every time, driving both productivity and strategic insight. In software development, intelligent deployment pipelines cut testing cycles and surface bugs before they reach production.Integrated, AI-accelerated operations now outperform piecemeal automation every time, driving both productivity and strategic insight. If your DevOps, clinical scheduling, or cybersecurity checks are still siloed, youâ€™re competing on yesterdayâ€™s terms. Requirements-Bachelor's or Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.-5+ years of software development experience, with a strong focus on backend systems.-Proficient in C++ with solid understanding of object-oriented design and best practices.-Strong debugging and problem-solving skills, with a deep sense of code ownership.-Experience working in fast-paced environments with Agile/DevOps practices.-Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with proven ability to work cross-functionally. Preferred Qualifications-Hardware Architecture Knowledge: Familiarity with concepts like memory hierarchy, cache coherence, interconnects, and buses.-SystemC & TLM-2.0: Experience with SystemC modeling and Transaction-Level Modeling is a strong plus.-Exposure to RTL design, simulation, or integration workflows in the semiconductor domain.Employment Application Form https://lnkd.in/gg595AaK hashtag#SkyeChipIsHiring hashtag#SeniorSoftwareEngineer hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#EDAtools hashtag#CareerOpportunity
